# Amber Attenuator
## Overview
**Price**: 1200 gp

**Weight**: 5 lbs.

## Description
These strange compasses with massive, fist-sized slots are made of lead, tin, silver, copper, titanium and a host of other metals. Attuned to the Amber Road, these devices greatly facilitate finding an entry to the Amber Road. Using an Amber Attenuator reduces the Wisdom (Survival) checkâ€™s DC required to find a byway of the Amber Roads by 10. An Amber Attenuator is also required to properly use Amberized Lodestones.
